org.terrier.matching.daat

Class FatFull

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.matching.BaseMatching
      • org.terrier.matching.daat.Full
        • org.terrier.matching.daat.FatFull
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matching

    public class FatFull
extends Full
    A subclass of Full that creates a FatResultSet. This class is a key component of the Fat framework, as described by Macdonald et al., TOIS 2013.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Eric Sutherland, Craig Macdonald
    See Also:
    "About Learning Models with Multiple Query Dependent Features. Craig Macdonald, Rodrygo L.T. Santos, Iadh Ounis and Ben He. Transactions on Information Systems. 31(3). 2013. [PDF]"
